BR.name: Shin Megami Tensei®: Devil Survivor Overclocked™
BR.description: Ampliado e aprimorado, o Devil Survivor Overclocked para Nintendo 3DS aprimora a versão original do jogo com a inclusão de voz em toda a longa e pouco convencional narrativa do jogo. Além disso, a própria história, que já apresentava vários finais de acordo com as decisões críticas tomadas pelo jogador, agora é concluída com um oitavo capítulo especial, um epílogo estimulante para os fãs de Shin Megami Tensei. Os retratos dos personagens e a arte desenhada à mão e belamente remasterizados beneficiam-se das telas de alta resolução do novo sistema, oferecendo aos jogadores uma experiência mais vívida e com maior fidelidade.

CA.name: Shin Megami Tensei®: Devil Survivor Overclocked™
CA.description: Expanded and enhanced, Devil Survivor Overclocked for Nintendo 3DS builds upon the game's original release with the addition of voice acting for the entirety of the game's lengthy, unconventional narrative. Moreover, that very story, already boasting multiple endings based on critical decisions by the player, now concludes with a special eighth chapter, a rousing epilogue for Shin Megami Tensei fans. The game's beautifully remastered hand drawn artwork and character portraits benefit from the new system's higher resolution screens, offering players a crisper, higher fidelity experience.

MX.name: Shin Megami Tensei®: Devil Survivor Overclocked™
MX.description: Expandido y mejorado, Devil Survivor Overclocked para Nintendo 3DS está basado en la versión original del juego con el agregado de actuación con voz para toda la narración prolongada y poco convencional del juego. Asimismo, esa misma historia, que ya ostenta finales múltiples de acuerdo con la decisión crítica del jugador, ahora concluye con un octavo capítulo especial, un epílogo conmovedor para los entusiastas de Shin Megami Tensei. Las ilustraciones del juego y los retratos de los personajes realizados a mano y rediseñados de forma magnífica aprovechan las pantallas del nuevo sistema que tienen una resolución más alta, ofreciendo a los jugadores imágenes más nítidas y de mayor fidelidad.

US.name: Shin Megami Tensei®: Devil Survivor Overclocked™
US.description: Expanded and enhanced, Devil Survivor Overclocked for Nintendo 3DS builds upon the game's original release with the addition of voice acting for the entirety of the game's lengthy, unconventional narrative. Moreover, that very story, already boasting multiple endings based on critical decisions by the player, now concludes with a special eighth chapter, a rousing epilogue for Shin Megami Tensei fans. The game's beautifully remastered hand drawn artwork and character portraits benefit from the new system's higher resolution screens, offering players a crisper, higher fidelity experience.
